name: Protect the Moon
description:
I created this game for my first game jam. The Buddy Up Jam: Winter 2022 The theme was "Big"  This is a Asteroids clone where you must protect the moon while dodging asteroids that keep growing in size. See how high you can score!

Credits:

  • Music: Beccapotamus
  • Sounds: jsfxr
  • Fonts: Kenney Rocket Square
  • Background: Zombi-Hed using this tutorial: Nebula Starfield | GIMP Tutorials
  • Game Models: Zombi-Hed using Unity Pro Builder
